DataElement.preferredName: Patient Informed Consent Cancel Withdrawal Other Paperwork Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text to describe the type of correspondence detailing a patient's withdrawal or cancellation of informed consent that is different from the options provided.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Informed Consent Cancel Withdrawal Other Paperwork
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Consent by a patient to a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved._To annul the ceasing of a patient's consent._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._The documents (e.g., forms, letters, reports) required for a particular activity.
